articles.content: The Victorian maverick and batting great had been given a lap of honour at the 'G in October following his untimely death in September. But that visit to the colosseum was sombre and dark the antithe… [+2386 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Keoghan
articles.title: 'Empty feeling': Devastated skippers take to the harbour amid Sydney to Hobart cancellation - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: For 75 years, a starter's gun has fired at 1pm on Boxing Day to start the Sydney to Hobart yacht race. This year, the boats hit the headland and turned straight back.
articles.content: Usually flying down the harbour on his famous race-winning yacht Ichiban, skipper Matt Allen instead took opted to take his powerboat out for the occasion. Allen was robbed of the chance to take back… [+2450 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Wu
articles.title: Marketing pitch: Why what you see at home on the field is not the real deal - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Cricket Australia has done away with on-field advertising, though only eagle-eyed viewers at home would have noticed the difference.
articles.content:
Not only would purists appreciate the clean field, this column has been told it is a neater look for sponsors, and the groundskeepers appreciate not having the paint seep into the soil.

articles.title: John Edrich obituary - The Guardian
articles.description: One of the great English batsmen and captain of Surrey hailed for his gritty concentration
